title: nitinseo
author: nitinseo
content: Hello Friends,                  I am here for help if someone can do. I want to create Ethereum full node. I don't have much knowledge. One my friend is running a crypto project. he is saying that i need to create project then i need to upload my project in to his project so i can earn money. I am not understanding much. Can someone help me to explain me about it. How i can create it. any tutorial please. or someone help in personal. if this works so i also can help to earn you money. Thanks

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: What's the scope of your project what sort of things is it dealing with?Setting up and running an ethereum full node is not a hard task, I've run them before. Not sure which I installed but one is available here: https://geth.ethereum.org/You might not need a node to interact with ethereum though, I think you can do a lot of things from a wallet.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: jackg on December 05, 2022, 03:10:59 PMYou might not need a node to interact with ethereum though, I think you can do a lot of things from a wallet. This is sort of what I was thinking as I was reading this.  Are you sure you need a full node?  What are you doing that makes you think that you need a full node?  My understanding is that running an ETH full node requires a ton of space and is a total pain in the ass.  The beauty of smart chains though is that you can interact with the chain without needing a node.  Maybe you misunderstood your friend and he was talking about uploading a smart contract to the chain as opposed to downloading the chain?  I think more information from you would likely lead to the advice of just using smart contracts on the chain and avoiding a node.
